scripts.build-deploy: npm run compile-templates && npm run build && AWS_PROFILE=default AWS_REGION=us-east-1 arc-deploy
scripts.start: npm run compile-templates && AWS_PROFILE=default AWS_REGION=us-east-1 NODE_ENV=testing arc-sandbox
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build ./src/html/get-index/static ./src/html/get-index/cache && npm run compile-templates && PREBUILD=1 lasso marko-hydrate:./src/html/get-index/page.marko --config ./src/html/get-index/lasso-config --name get-index
scripts.compile-templates: npm run arc-install && NODE_ENV=production marko compile --server --ignore ./src/**/node_modules/** --files ./src/**/*.marko
